column4: Hi does anyone know when a more reliable upgrade from 11.10 to 12.04 will be made available?
Oh sorry I thought it was already out
so 11.10 has come out... thought I already had how do I check?
yes I saw those and backed off from it because I don't have the skill.  Is there a way to see if I have 11.10 now?  I thought I did but maybe I don't?
easiest way is to open a terminal and type lsb_release -a
